JobFullDesc:
We are seeking an experienced and highly motivated Data Scientist to join our team in New York. This individual will support enterprise initiatives on segmentation, personalization, and campaign forecasting/optimization through in-depth, statistical & quantitative analyses of consumer data, and integration of high quality prediction systems into our brands & products.

Primary Responsibilities:

Lead development of models that enable learning of semantics of data (our content that includes text, images and video) Devise better data driven models of user behaviorWork towards long-term ambitious research goals, while identifying intermediate milestonesWork with both management and organizational peers to improve results by applying quantitative analysis, data mining, and machine learning methods to ongoing activities.Design and present recommendations to guide future business and research directions.Conduct statistical analysis of consumer web, demographic, behavioral, and transactional data in support of strategic initiatives, from very large data sets (both structured and unstructured). Project work covers all phases – conceptualization, assessment, planning, data acquisition, profiling, modeling, documentation, and presentation of findings/recommendations.Design tests, benchmark and track performance of analytic solutions/models over time.Work with partners in Data Engineering, Marketing, Product, Programmatic and Ad Operations teams, to operationalize integration of analytic models into production environment(s).Conduct exploratory analysis against consumer data from internal or external sources, to surface interesting and valuable insights.Stay current on relevant academic and industry developments to identify best-in-class algorithms, techniques, libraries, etc.
Desired Skills & Qualifications:The ideal candidate will have many, if not all, of the skills and experience here:

Exceptional quantitative and statistical skills, including experience with machine learning, natural language processing, deep learning and other techniques appropriate for large-scale data modeling and analysis.Experience manipulating and analyzing data from different sources.Four or more years of relevant experience, preferably in a consumer-based organization.Exceptional communication skills, particularly in communicating and visualizing quantitative findings in a compelling and actionable manner for business stakeholders.Proficiency in Python, SQL, Julia, or R.  Experience with Hadoop, Pig, Hive AWS EMR, Spark, Flink, or BeamTwo or more years of business/marketing analytics experience, preferably in a consumer-based media organization.Strong set of professional skills: attention to detail; analytic, logical and creative problem solving; critical thinking; ability to work independently and within a cross-functional team.MS, Ph.D.,BS, or equivalent industry experience in Computer Science, Mathematics, or other related STEM (science, technology, engineering, and math) fields
Skills: data science, machine learning, Python, Sql, Hive
